name: Escape! (Demo)
description:
Escape! is a First Person Puzzle Adventure made for My First Game Jam - Summer Edition 2018. 

Our goal was to build an adventure puzzle game with low poly aesthetic and a dense mysterious atmosphere.  Obvious the gameplay needs some tweaking but we managed to come up with a core game design that can be build upon in further developement. This is a demo that demonstrates the feel of the game and the mechanics we could implement during two weeks of development time.

Apart from the things we made ourselves we used the following free assets:

Low Poly Styled Trees (by Daniel Robnik):
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/low-poly-styled-trees-...
Low Poly Styled Rocks (by Daniel Robnik):
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/low-poly-styled-rocks-43...
